p: Most of raw materials (metals/minerals) are collected from earth and there is a chance for mixing of impurities, toxins, and heterogeneous and unwanted substances to a large extent. Hence, these are subjected to various methods of purification and detoxification techniques (Shodhana) and incineration ( Marana) to make them competent for medicinal use. Both purification/detoxification and incineration techniques are indicated to induce certain qualities, which are essential for making sure of the safe and easy assimilation of the material in the living body.
